mapper.select: select ec.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ui.password , ec.emergency_contact_id , ui.last_login_date , ec.name , ec.phone_number , ui.phone_number as phone_number_ui , ui.registration_date , ui.username FROM emergency_contact ec left join user_info ui on ec.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ec.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ui.password , ec.emergency_contact_id , ui.last_login_date , ec.name , ec.phone_number , ui.phone_number as phone_number_ui , ui.registration_date , ui.username FROM emergency_contact ec left join user_info ui on ec.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ec.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ui.password , ec.emergency_contact_id , ui.last_login_date , ec.name , ec.phone_number , ui.phone_number as phone_number_ui , ui.registration_date , ui.username FROM emergency_contact ec left join user_info ui on ec.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id where ec.emergency_contact_id = #{id}
